DataElement.preferredName: Medical Review Panel Data Responses Received Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date on which opinions and responses from members of a medical review panel (MRP) are received.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Review Panel Data Response Received
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._A committee having supervisory powers._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation; a statement that solves a problem or explains how to solve the problem._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.:A committee having supervisory powers.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

Concepts.definition: The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation; a statement that solves a problem or explains how to solve the problem.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation; a statement that solves a problem or explains how to solve the problem.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Georgetown University Lombardi Cancer Center clinical trial. 2.2.2016. dmr
